name: Score Jam 2020 - Sonar
description:
This is my first game jam and my first game creation using Construct 3. its a lot of first so please be kind.

I took the literal approach and went with climbing the rank of high score.

There's no leaderboard per se. You can see the score when you die.

I tried art/audio but its something xD

Controls

WASD to move

ENTER for menu selection

Mouse to aim
